library:
<class name="pointcloud_transport/raw_pub" type="message_transport::RawPublisher" base_class_type="message_transport::PublisherPlugin">
This is the default publisher. It publishes the objects as-is on the base topic.
<class name="pointcloud_transport/raw_sub" type="message_transport::RawSubscriber" base_class_type="message_transport::SubscriberPlugin">
This is the default pass-through subscriber for topics of type PointCloud
<class name="pointcloud_transport/sharedmem_pub" type="sharedmem_transport::SharedmemPublisher" base_class_type="message_transport::PublisherPlugin">
This is the default publisher. It publishes the objects as-is on the base topic.
<class name="pointcloud_transport/sharedmem_sub" type="sharedmem_transport::SharedmemSubscriber" base_class_type="message_transport::SubscriberPlugin">
This is the default pass-through subscriber for topics of type PointCloud
<class name="pointcloud_transport/decimated_pub" type="decimated_transport::DecimatedPublisher" base_class_type="message_transport::PublisherPlugin">
This publisher only publishes 1/10th of the point cloud data
<class name="pointcloud_transport/decimated_sub" type="decimated_transport::DecimatedSubscriber" base_class_type="message_transport::SubscriberPlugin">
This is the default pass-through subscriber for topics of type PointCloud
<class name="pointcloud_transport/udpmulti_pub" type="udpmulti_transport::UDPMultiPublisher" base_class_type="message_transport::PublisherPlugin">
This publisher published this point cloud as UDP multicast telegram. Size is limited to 8092 bytes
<class name="pointcloud_transport/udpmulti_sub" type="udpmulti_transport::UDPMultiSubscriber" base_class_type="message_transport::SubscriberPlugin">
This subscriber subscribes to point cloud UDP multicast telegrams.
